description: Leyton Orient suffer their fifth successive League One defeat as Northampton Town take three points on the road.
title: Leyton Orient 1-2 Northampton Town
title_page: Leyton Orient 1-2 Northampton Town - Home side suffer fifth successive defeat - BBC Sport
maintext:
Leyton Orient have won just one of their last eight league games against Northampton Town (D3 L4), though that sole victory did come in this exact fixture last season (4-3).
Northampton Town have lost just one of their last nine away league games against Leyton Orient (D3 L5), scoring 2.3 goals on average during that run.
Leyton Orient have won six of their last eight home league games (L2), keeping five clean sheets across that time.
Northampton have lost just two of their last 15 league games against sides from London (W7 D6), though did lose their last match against a side from the capital 5-0 vs Charlton Athletic in December.
